nodes.text: Who Are the Rebels? is a Star Wars Rebels young readers reference title that provides more information about the major characters of Star Wars Rebels. It one of six hardcover books included in the Star Wars Rebels: Storybook Library boxed set. The boxed set was originally stated for a December 22, 2014, but as of that date, the title had not appeared in listings in online retailers. Star Wars Rebels: Storybook Library was eventually released through retailers including Amazon at a later date.
